label: 宮崎友禅斎
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
見出し読み: みやざきゆうぜんさい
説明文: [Dyer who] pioneered the yūzen style of intricate dyeing which provided commoners with a stubstitute for the brocade and embroidered garments that were forbidden to them (p. 708).
